author: Julia Rutledge
content: Bouncy Castle, Superhero Air Juggler/ Ball pond and Superhero Soft Play Hire;  I’d like to give a HUGE thank you to Bexley Castle Hire for the amazing service, before booking, on delivery, efficiency and professionalism throughout. Upon hiring a venue with an incredibly low ceiling height, I was assisted with a last minute change to the castle hired, which also complimented my theme. I would not hesitate to  Highly recommend this wonderful business to all, for your celebrations requirements. Thank you you contributed to Alfie having a fab 5th Birthday Party �
